kits.name: Next.js DApp Starter
kits.description: Full-stack web application template with Next.js 14, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Privy wallet authentication.

kits.name: React Native Wallet App
kits.description: Mobile wallet application built with React Native and Expo. Includes Movement SDK integration for transactions.

kits.name: Vue.js Analytics Dashboard
kits.description: Real-time blockchain analytics dashboard built with Vue 3, Vite, and Movement SDK for on-chain data visualization.

kits.name: Telegram Mini App
kits.description: Telegram bot with embedded mini app functionality. Uses Telegram Bot API and Movement SDK for Web3 features.

kits.name: Fungible Token Module
kits.description: Move smart contract for creating and managing fungible tokens. Includes mint, burn, and transfer functionality.

kits.name: NFT Collection Module
kits.description: Digital asset collection smart contract with minting, metadata, and royalty support using the Aptos Token Standard.

kits.name: DEX Swap Module
kits.description: Automated market maker (AMM) module with liquidity pools, token swaps, and LP token management.

kits.name: Staking & Rewards Module
kits.description: Token staking smart contract with configurable reward rates, lock periods, and governance voting power.

kits.name: Multisig Wallet Module
kits.description: Multi-signature wallet contract requiring multiple approvals for transactions. Configurable threshold and signers.

kits.name: Escrow & Payments Module
kits.description: Secure escrow contract for conditional payments. Supports milestones, disputes, and automatic releases.
